findings.title: Potential claiming stuck for several periods after withdraw
findings.description: Division by zero can occur when periodTotalSupply becomes zero, making it impossible to claim rewards.

findings.title: Potential inability to claim reward
findings.description: There is a `for` loop with potentially huge amounts of iterations, so that can take an uncontrolled amount of gas and that can cause inability to calculate reward amount for particular users if gas consumption reaches the maximum limit.

findings.title: claimReward/withdraw allowed to execute before staking starts
findings.description: These methods formally can be executed before staking starts but after setup.

findings.title: Unoptimized check in `calculateReward` loop
findings.description: The check 'if(i > user.period)' always returns true after the first iteration, causing excess gas spending each iteration.

findings.title: Different code style
findings.description: Inconsistent naming convention used in `_fee_beneficiary` variable, using snake case instead of camel case.

findings.title: Too complicated status checks
findings.description: There are a lot of different status checks, some of them directly using `endTime`, `closeTime`, `startTime` mixed with `status` field. So it can cause potential issues in the future related to incorrect status interpretation.
